Page 9
The Honorable Alison J. Nathan
December 13, 2021
asking Mr. Scarola, Mr. Edwards, and Mr. Glassman about the above-described issues, Ms. Maxwell has a constitutional right to call then as witnesses and to ask them the necessary questions.
Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
Laura A. Menninger
